website_summaries.verdict: A wonderful buy for customers seeking a large folding vanity mirror for in-home use.
pros: Included LED lights can be adjusted by touch-sensor technology
Mirror offers a true image alongside 2x and 3x magnification
Mirror rotates 180 degrees, so you can see yourself at every angle
Includes USB cable to power mirror
cons: Some customers wish the mirror base was taller
LED lights are inconsistent in quality

customer_reviews.title: Possible fire risk!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my product a little over two months ago and have loved it until last week it would not turn on. I did have the usb cord in the back plugged in and when I tried to remove it, it was stuck in there. When I was finally able to remove it I noticed the back where the cord goes in was warped and the melted/burned. I would tell anyone and everyone to be careful of this product. I was lucky it didn’t cause a huge fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for a makeup novice 💖
customer_reviews.text: This is my first lighted mirror and I love it! I do wish the side mirrors had lights, too. This is neat for traveling because the base comes apart from the mirror for easy stowing. The mirror itself (when closed) is about the size of a tablet or iPad. The color is super cute for how I want to decorate it 😻🌟💖
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best mirror ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It's pretty heavy and feels more expensive than it is. I think a lot of the reviews saying it's too dim don't realize if you hold the button it gets really bright! I love it so so much. The actual mirrors are very clear and great quality (if you've ever bought a bad mirror you know what I mean) I can even use it in the dark with great results! Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wary to buy just because the price was so low. I expected the lights to be dim and the chance of it breaking after a week. But honestly So far so good! The lights are extremely bright and even work at a distance if your vanity sits further back. The mirror itself is a pretty rose gold and has a sturdy thick plastic outside, inside mirrors are nice quality, and the close up mirrors are nice. It’s super thin and space saving too! Easy to travel with and assemble. Would buy again no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Britnee James

customer_reviews.title: Return window closed before Christmas for defective items
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on October 24 for a Christmas present for my daughter. She just opened it today on Christmas and it doesn’t work the lights won’t turn on. I guess my return window closed on November 24. So what happens if you give it as a Christmas gift? now I’m stuck with a broken mirror
customer_reviews.author: Heather Whitney

customer_reviews.title: SPOT ON MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror!! A little small than I expected but after setting it up, it's the perfect size. It's really light, you can travel with it. The brightness is perfect, especially when winter hits, I'll have enough lighting in my room for my makeup. To decrease or increase the brightness hold down the power button to adjust to your liking. So far, it's working as it should. Mirror is being powered by a USB chord. Happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!? Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Okay ladies! Or fellow makeup connoisseurs! I’m going to tell you exactly what you need to know. GET IT. That’s it. I love this thing. I waited a month to see how it would do before writing a review. It’s amazing I love it. The lights! Ugh just what I was looking for! I use it every morning!
customer_reviews.author: Jessika the Messika

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in with the cord provided, red light comes on, lights don't come on. Put batteries in, lights don't turn on. Left plugged in for 3 hours, lights still dont turn on. Sending it back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: A few drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expecting a traditional lighted mirror, with a center panel that rotated to a full magnifying panel. It is a lighted mirror with smaller magnifying mirror panels on the right side. Here are the drawbacks, though... If you wear glasses, you may find yourself constantly repositioning the center panel, as the embedded LEDS cause glare. The magnifying (2x and 3x) panels are only on the right side mirror. This makes it difficult to see the left side of your face unless you contort your neck in an awkward angle.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Lights didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this...but the lights didn’t work. I tried batteries, plugged in...plugged in with batteries. I saw no on/off switch anywhere on the mirror. There is a little red light next to the spot to plug the mirror in- I checked to see if it ever turned green to indicate a charge- no luck. The touch screen spot on the mirror could be a sticker for all I know because it didn’t work at ALL. I’m so disappointed. I’m debating ordering another to see what happens. So upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Mallina Cook

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: The light did not work. So I returned it. It was very hard to get the piece apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: Lacked Brightness
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a makeup mirror was a 4 month process. I must have purchased 5 from local stores and online. None of them matched the quality and brightness of the one I had been using for over 10 + years. This DeWEISE was recommended so i purchased. Unfortunately, it did not provide me with the brightness and magnification I was determined to get (lol). I returned without any problems and was credited.
customer_reviews.author: Mima

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning this item. Mirror is not what ...
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning this item. Mirror is not what I was hoping for. Light is very soft and not very clear!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different light
customer_reviews.text: The lights are horrible. I see spots for a long time after using this. Hate the usb. Never have enough cubes and the cord is short. I went with a much less expensive option with three light choices, all of which are perfect. Sucks I bought myself one and one as a gift and now I wasted all of that money. Don’t waste yours.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Using the cord has been fine. It's a really pretty mirror and looks just ...
customer_reviews.text: The lighting is very, very white almost bluish and if you take it down to a lower setting they will start to flicker a bit which kinda hurts to look at. Also if you were buying this with the intention of using batteries, don't. I killed four triple a batteries in two days only using the mirror for a fee minutes morning and night. It does come with a usb cord for charging but you have to get your own wall adaptor. Using the cord has been fine. It's a really pretty mirror and looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: dino

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this mirror!!!! I've never had an issue. The light was bright but it was perfect when I had to do my makeup when the boyfriend was asleep. I did just learn that if you turn the light on then press and hold the light button the light will dim. Then after you dim it you can press and hold again and it'll get brighter!!!! Well worth the money!!!! I'd definitely recommend to my friends!!!! -kristen
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fox

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is good, except it gets dirty really fast and the mirror that magnifies the most is so small and you have to almost bend down to even look in it. Also the batteries die so, so fast so the charging feature is almost out of the question because the batteries don't even last long enough to keep the lights bright enough to use. I like this mirror because it's easy to store and I like that you can close it but the whole light, charging and magnifying feature it pretty much pointless. Let me know if this is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not rose gold but copper instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughtet's birthday which is next month. My husband and I plugged it in (comes with the USB cord but no adapter box thing) and turned the light on just by touching the circle sensor at the bottom of main mirror. If you hold your finger on the sensor it dims just as described. This set up is, in fact, light weight. I'm not sure how sturdy it is. I have rated it 3 stars, at this point, primarily because it was advertised as rose gold and is very much a copper shade instead and not very appealing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Davidson

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this mirror. The magnification isn't that good, and the lights are basically worthless. You have to use it in a well lit room, unless you put your face 2" from it. When you close it, the majority of the time it causes the lights to come back on. I decided I wanted to return it, but unfortunately was 12 days past the cutoff. I haven't traveled with it, but the base is next to impossible to remove once you attach it. Also, I guarantee that the lights will turn on in your suitcase during the trip, so if you do buy it, bring extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kanthony

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, the reviews seems good
customer_reviews.text: Small mirror, had to sit it up on something to see in it. Lights aren't placed very well to view all mirrors. Disappointed, the reviews seems good. We did a bathroom remodel and keep the mirror in the box until it was complete, now its too late to return item, bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror but disappointed in the lighting
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror but I am disappointed in the lighting. The lights dim out SO FAST. I have tried a few different brands of batteries and that doesn’t seem to matter. I have had the mirror for only a couple months and I have changed the batteries 6 times. I don’t know if my lights are defective becaue that seems very unreasonable to me. I do not use the mirror daily maybe 1-2 a week with the light on for an average of maybe 10 minutes. I get about 3 uses befor the lights are so dim I have to change them.
customer_reviews.author: raquel beayon

customer_reviews.title: Love it a must have
customer_reviews.text: Okay I love love love love this mirror it's great for when you have bad lighting in your house. I have bad lighting in my house and this works perfect for me. Its sectioned into 4 parts. 1 big one with LED Lights, 1 regular, one zoomed in ×2 and one zoomed in ×4 so I love this mirror and it's a must have for any girl. I highly recommend it. The only thing that it's not battery based it's with cord so if you don't plug it in it won't light on. You have to keep it plugged so it works.
customer_reviews.author: Merna Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my vanity!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror really out did my expectations. It looks great and has just enough lighting for your face. The magnifying mirrors are really helpful, however the 2x mirror is in an odd place so you need to bend down a bit to use it. Overall 100% worth the money if you're looking for a new addition to your vanity or need a portable travel mirror
customer_reviews.author: Squinda

customer_reviews.title: Not shaded as depicted.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product in rose gold. It is rosier than the same mirror in the shade “gold”, but not anywhere near as “rose gold” as the stock photo depicts. That was the biggest disappointment about this purchase. It is very easy to set up and comes with a USB that plugs into any wall USB charger adapter. The lights are also very, very bright! I read previous reviews that said the lights were dim and extra light is needed. I have found this not to be true. Overall, I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful buy!
customer_reviews.text: It is better than I expected!!!! Lights are BRIGHT and adjustable. It is SUCH a beautiful and useful makeup mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter’s room. I plugged it in before giving it to her and I can see myself borrowing this. Great lighting. And the 2X and 3X mirrors... well let’s just say you’ll see those pores way to up close. Eek. Great buy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CDN in Hong Kong

customer_reviews.title: The best travel led mirror imo
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several similar mirrors, but this one is by my favorite. I like that it's powered with a USB instead of relying on batteries, because battery operated mirrors tend to be too bright when the batteries are fresh and to dim when they start to go. I use this mirror a lot for travel and the folding design prevents it from getting scratched or broken in my suitcase. The dimming feature is my favorite part about it because it allows you to adjust for different light levels.
customer_reviews.author: Venus Envy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is GREAT and so is the light, as long as it's plugged in. On battery, the light is already much much dimmer and my batteries aren't that old at all (like a few days). Will continue to test other batteries. For now I will say GREAT when plugged in but may need a longer cord. I wish it was charge-able (which is what I assumed when I bought it..oops). If it turns out it's my batteries I will change this to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware....
customer_reviews.text: buyer beware! Love this mirror. I have one for myself and went to order one as a gift... the price has increased almost $20 and continues to increase each day. If possible wait till after the holidays and hopefully the price will return to its original $20.
customer_reviews.author: amy burke

customer_reviews.title: Totally love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mirror. I use it so I don’t turn on the light & wake up others because I get ready for work early in the AM. I love that you can adjust the light brightness & the mirrors. I only wish you could raise & lower the mirror so I don’t have to lean down to it. I love the pink color & the little dish to put trinkets/rings in. Totally satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: maisweets

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it is supposed to work without needing to plug it in. However, I tried it and the lights lasted maybe 10 minutes before they started to dim without the plug. We just keep in plugged in all the time. Other than that, the lights are bright and the mirror is clear. It is slim and light weight so it's easy to bring with you on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Dolan S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Feels and looks very cheap, the lights are very dim. The mirror is useless per its intended use. I bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter and I was really kind of embarrassed overall. The rose gold color is more of a deep country pink
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Many

customer_reviews.title: Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! Where do I start?! You can use batteries or plug it in, the lights are bright with dimming features, it's very light weight, and once folded you can easily stick it in your purse or travel bag! This is definitely a must buy and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rashonda

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror, bad cord
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror and I love the different magnifying sections. I just wish both sides had different magnifying levels not just the one. Only neg thing about this mirror vanity is the cord. That could be why some are saying the light is not bright. I got a really bad cord from the beginning and I tried another android cord and it got really bright. The cord that comes with it first is not that long second was a bad cord that won’t stst in and falls out and therefore makes the light deemer then it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Ellenangel83

customer_reviews.title: Light does not work
customer_reviews.text: I am currently overseas and have been ordering a lot off Amazon lately because I can't find a lot of what I need is not here. So you can imagine how disappointed I was when I got my mirror and the light does not work. Very frustrating but at the end of the day I still have a functioning mirror so I guess that's cool.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Happy but regretfully.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror comes in very handy. the fact that is adjustable that has a back light really is beneficial. My only issue is there is a nick in the top left-hand corner of the main mirror, which is really just an ugly blemish, this does not cause any real distortion in the usage of the mirror. But it does cause me some serious regrets for this purchase. Started to send it back but needed and did want to wait for credit in order to repurches again.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: You can adjust the brightness of the lights
customer_reviews.text: Because of the negative reviews on the mirror (mainly the lighting) I was skeptical about purchasing. But I’m glad I did! It’s been a big help for my makeup routine. For those who say it’s too bright, you can dim the lights by holding the power button. And for those saying it’s too dim, also try holding the power button to adjust the brightness level. A quick tap of the power button only turns the lights on/off. Hope it helps others but so far it’s been good for me!
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife (she picked it out) and she has used it for a few days now. I asked her this morning if she likes it and her reply was, "No, I love it." She hasn't used it for travel yet so I didn't rate that aspect. We're not sure how long the batteries will last because we have it connected to a power supply but it's just as bright with NEW batteries as it is when connected to the power supply. I'll edit this post after we take a trip and test out the battery only option.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Aggie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our winter home. It doesn't light up as much as I'd like, but it's a nice little mirror. It'd be very nice for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broke during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Some genius packed this "glass" mirror product in a lightly padded envelope. it arrived with the top of the original box smashed open, a crack in the main mirror and it does not light at all. Cheap product + poor packaging for shipping = a complete waste of time/money. Summary: Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Will Keizer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from the mirror in a palate
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I've just started learning more about doing makeup, and this helps a lot. The size is perfect and the lighting does help though it's not great if you have a dark room (I still have an extra lamp or go somewhere with more light). I have traveled with it. It's light and folds up, but is a weird shape. Unless you have a massive makeup bag, you'll have to pack it separate. The magnification is great when trying to put on lashes or do detail work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Trinque

customer_reviews.title: Cute/Easy travel mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror came exactly as pictured, only complaint is the battery life. After one use I haft to change the batteries or the light gets very dim, however there is also the plug in option, just is more convenient to be able to use w/o the plug. I wish the battery life was better.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled !
customer_reviews.text: Just received the mirror this weekend . Put in the batteries and thrilled w the brightness . Also the mirror tilts back and forward. Also love that it’s not overly magnified I keep seeing the 10x magnifying mirrors and they are assured w how they warp the view
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, LEDs seem bright enough
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to replace a simple circular mirror she had been using for years. This was definitely an improvement - the LEDs are pretty bright, despite what I saw in some reviews, and the magnification areas have been great for her. Would recommend as a budget option for anyone looking to get a makeup enthusiast a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Its very compact, lightweight and easy to store when not in use. Like all the diffrent magnifications. Down side is its on my vanity and its not tall enough to see in. Had to stack boxes under it. Also the light is not nearly bright enough. May needs bigger lights, or lights around the whole thing. Not just around the main mirror. A little dissapointed, it had good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down one of my favorite purchases! Exceeded my expectations! I know I will never have issues with my make up looking crazy again because of the dim lighting in my bathroom the LED lighting is perfect not blinding!! My favorite part is you can use the charger or batteries.....I'm going to purchase another one for my daughter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Had this since September and it already broke. Doesn’t light up with the cord or batteries. Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy that my girlfriend loved this item, it definitely looks cheaper online than it is when you see it in person. The lights worked fantastic and if you have a portable charger, I’d strongly suggest using that to power the lights. It is a little difficult to plug in a micro usb (don’t jam it in there, take your time). Overall, you get yours money’s worth!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Battery operated and attractive Makeup Mirror~!!
customer_reviews.text: My makeup mirror is a lovely gold rose color....it’s large enough but not so large that it takes up too much space. It’s easily portable...bright and runs on batteries....so it’s perfect if you don’t want to deal with finding a plug in the right place~!! It opens up so that you have the one in the middle & one on each side. It’s thin so it doesn’t take up a lot of room...
customer_reviews.author: BuddhistBiker

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The mirror comes with a long USB cable, which was unfortunately broken. Alternatively, it can be powered by batteries. The mirror itself work fine. The light is great, sufficiently bright and can be dimmed. I guess from the outside the mirror does not look like super high quality, since it is plastic, but that is something that I did also not expect from the price. I still like it a lot and will keep it despite the broken USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: When plugged in, my lights started dimming and only working on batteries (which is much dimmer than plugged in). I pulled the charger cord out of the back to check and the metal part that is inside (that the cord plugs into) came out with the plug—now it is useless. Please note that I did not travel with this and it stayed in one place so I’m not sure why the plug was so fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Dreese

customer_reviews.title: Deserves 10 stars not 5 ! It’s excellent !
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product 10 stars I would ! The shipping was really fast ! The actual product is sooo beautiful and the lighting is superb ! It uses four AAA batteries or a usb cable option ! It folds neatly and the design just fits into any room decor ! The magnification mirrors are great ! I got one each for my daughters and myself and I’m glad I did ! 1000% satisfies with this product !
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made for the price. Very lightweight. Not happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many makeup mirrors in my 50 plus years of wearing makeup. This is by far the best one I have ever owned. It is easy to use, small, doesn’t take up entire counter. One touch operation, with increased magnification in small side mirrors. Both of my granddaughters love it want one. When they are older.
customer_reviews.author: james berg

customer_reviews.title: USB...NOT SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I like this mirror. Unfortunately the usb is a serious issue as mine is broken. Not just doesn’t work but came clean out of the unit. When not in use it sits folded up with the cord folded up under it. Still, out of nowhere the usb dislodged. It now will only work on batteries and it goes through those really fast. Pity, this mirror would have gotten 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Lights are weak even with brand new batteries. Do yourself a favor and buy one that plugs into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you really can’t beat this mirror. It gets very bright when you keep it plugged in but you can also use it away from a plug using just battery power. It doesn’t get as bright this way, but it’s a convenient second option for use. I got mine in the rose gold color and it gives my bathroom a very nice touch. My only complaint is that sometimes it flops up and down and won’t stay put upwards in a certain position, but I may just need to tighten the screws. Overall I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel DeLong

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: i love the fact that this mirror comes with LED lights and magifying mirrors. when i got the package, i was very surprised and very pleased. the mirror came in a beautiful sturdy box. it was bubble wrapped and so was the base. this is a beautiful mirror. after installing the batteries, i was amazed at how nice and bright the mirror became. the rosy color is also very attractive. i'm glad that i made this purchase. i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mirror. Great to travel with, has the option to plug in or use battery power. Note that the battery powered option does not give off as much light as plugging it in. If you do plug it in, you will need an adapter. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Meder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and very bright!
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could sit at my computer desk in the mornings to do my makeup. The lights are very bright, which is nice because the layout of them helps give you an even lighting for your makeup needs. The 2x and 3x zooms are outstanding too. Incredibly easy to assemble, and I didn't realize it came with the USB cord so that's a plus! Allows me to power it using my Corsair head set stand lol! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lupo Family

customer_reviews.title: the lights arnt as bright as i would like
customer_reviews.text: so, their is countless reviews on this mirror , so i do love it ! i got it for my vanity as extra mirror the lights i wish were brighter for sure but its a nice mirror the tri fold is awesome the quality is great the color is gorgous its a cool product nothing is perfect in life but this is cool thing to get if your traveling or need the zoom mirror to detail your make up or eye brows its got the 360 bottom so you can move it anywhere you need it !
customer_reviews.author: Andrea N.

customer_reviews.title: Light won't come on with USB or batteries
customer_reviews.text: When I got this mirror in, I thought it'd be the perfect addition to my vanity. After several attempts of trying to get the light on (USB cord, multiple battery changes), it just wouldn't come on. I believe I've gotten a faulty piece of equipment. It works well enough as a mirror, but that's about it. I definitely wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this mirror. The most perfect product I’ve bought. My sister bought one from a local store but only has one mirror this one on the other hand has everything I need!! The light is great I take it with me everywhere I got! And I also love it because you either plug it in or add batteries to it when you’re on the go or traveling. I recommend this product to anyone. I bought my mother one and she loves it! Now my mother in law wants one and we’re buying hers next! -ROSE
customer_reviews.author: SK93

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is 5 STARS!!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is lightweight, its BRIGHT, and its CLEAR. It has multiple brightness settings for every situation. Even if youre in a completely dark room. The mirror is very clear. It isn't a cheap blurry mess. It also has the option for an outlet OR batteries so you can seriously use it anywhere. My girlfriend absolutely loves this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tannor Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Lights Dim After Just 1 Month
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this mirror. However, even with new lithium batteries, the lights in this mirror have dimmed to the point that they do nothing at all. It is really frustrating because the lighting was the reason I purchased this mirror over others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and she loves it. It's pretty small but that being said you can take it anywhere very lightweight and portable and serves its purpose very well. When I opened it and turned the light on I even went 'woah this is so cool!' You can also adjust how bright the light is but still keeps that cool bright color.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Wade

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift, so I have not actually tried it. I just opened the package to see of the glass wasn't broken. Item came quicker than expected. It looks nice. It seems little bulky for travel. I wouldn't use it for that. I'm giving only 4 stars because I don't know if it works yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mimakoky

customer_reviews.title: Not Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for about 2 months, the the port on the mirror literally fell out partially. Not well made. Yes you can out batteries in, but it drains them fast and the light is so dim there's really no point.
customer_reviews.author: Kdobbs

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Randomly might flash every once in a while when in use for 45 min but didn't inconvenience me in any way. Adjustable tilt is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Marie Erin Jude

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this mirror!!! Super bright and I love how you can adjust the brightness. I ordered the black one and I love the way it looks. I also love how you can close the mirror, looks very sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis B

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for price
customer_reviews.text: Really great mirror for the price. You can plug it in or use batteries which is helpful if you need to move it. The zoom on the mirrors really helps. Lighting is perfect with no dead lights.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way the the mirror lights up evenly to do my make up in the mornings. It’s very convenient to have on my desk it folds up so easily and takes up hardly any room. I have my make up at my work desk & it doesn’t bother me when I’m doing my work. It’s very light and durable I haven’t had any issues with it since I’ve had it
customer_reviews.author: Kiara Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror but not for me
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research and positive reviews, I chose this makeup mirror. Unfortunately, I was disappointed by the size and lighting for my needs however, it may work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flaky mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was ok not great when I first purchased it. Now just less than a month and a half it lights by itself while closed and when using randomly dims down to off and blinks. It’s annoying. I’ve checked my batteries and the connection and all are fine. I would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: cher mccoy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. I purchased this with a gift card I got for Christmas. As soon as I got it in the mail I wanted to use it (was excited to try it). I plugged it in and the light wouldn't come on. So I thought maybe I should give it some time to "charge". I then read thay it doesn't need charged and it should work as soon as plugged in. So I thought maybe the cord was broken, so I got some batteries and tried that. Nope still didn't work. I would not recommend this product to anyone. Cheaply made. Was of $35
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, dim lights
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror, but wish it was bigger and that the lights were brighter. Even with fresh batteries the lights aren’t as bright as I was hoping. The great thing is the different magnifications, and it’s perfect for use while traveling. Hotels don’t always have the best mirror access, but this has been very useful to do makeup at a desk, or even propped up in the bed. I will be purchasing a larger, brighter mirror to keep on my makeup desk at home though.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to travel with it doesn’t take up too much space or add too much weight. The only downside is the lights brightness, when I try to do my hair there’s a big shadow around my head so it’s hard for me to see what I’m doing. Even when the light is adjusted to the lowest setting. But this mirror is absolutely perfect for doing my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great with cord, not so much with batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror, with 2x and 3x magnification. It can be operated by a USB plug or batteries. As you might suspect, when plugged in by USB, the lights around the mirror are a LOT brighter. However, it serves it's purpose and so far has been a great portable mirror. *I have not experienced any burning or melting of the plastic, experienced by other reviewers thankfully. However, I would recommend not keep it plugged in and lit up for an extended period of time .
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mirror! Don't Believe Bad Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I saw bad reviews about warped plug in, and became nervous. Easy Solution: Don't leave it plugged in when not using it!! The plug in is located at the bottom, not the back like shown in pictures. If you want to avoid the problem, leave it unplugged as I do, except when using it. Mirror is plenty great without using the light anyways!
customer_reviews.author: steve.

customer_reviews.title: Could use some improvements
customer_reviews.text: The LED lighting seems like a good idea but in actuality, it's too harsh for good use in applying makeup. It's also nearly impossible to open the tri-fold design without getting fingerprints all over the mirror. I do like the fact that its design makes it compact when folded and put away so it doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: truthseeker1970

customer_reviews.title: Batteries Exploded the First Time I Used This Item
customer_reviews.text: When I received my mirror, I assembled it right away and installed brand new AAA batteries in the correct orientation according to the instruction guide and panel orientation template. As soon as I turned on the mirror lights, I heard a snapping sound and the lights became instantly dimmer. I turned off the light and opened the back panel, only to find that 2 of the 4 brand new batteries were leaking potassium hydroxide. Very disappointed with this defective and dangerous product. I would not recommend and I will be returning this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice ish, not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mirror for if you don't wear makeup very often or travel a lot. The lights died very quickly, not very bright, but it'll do if you don't use it everyday and don't mind changing the batteries a lot. I bought a better mirror in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: It's was affordable.The mirror is a bit heavy for it to stay tilted at some angles so that could be annoying but overall it does what it needs to for the most part. It's a small mirror with some lights. Good enough for normal day to day make up.
customer_reviews.author: Pa T. Vang

customer_reviews.title: Magnifiers are Useless
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst makeup mirrors I’ve ever used. The side magnifiers are only useful for one side of my face, so I can only successfully apply my eye makeup on one eye! The light is too dark on the other side of my face to see my other eye closeup. I want to return it, but it’s too late.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love my mirror. Clear image. The light brightness is controllable which I love. The product doesn’t feel cheap. Definitely got my money’s worth with it!!! Hands down recommend for personal use. I’ve been doing makeup professionally for almost 7 years now so I’d like to think I know a decent amount on good vs bad beauty products.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Mulhern

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!!!! The lighting is perfect! The mirror is so good! I’m really happy I bought this! I got rose gold to match my laptop and I’m so excited! The color isn’t off at all! So if you love the color rose gold you will be happy with this. I was worried the mirror would be broken cuz sometimes that happens during delivery but it was perfect! Delivery was also fast but because it snowed a lot of peoples packages got delayed in my area. But if it wasn’t for that I would have gotten my order in two days! Also just a warning it doesn’t come with batteries lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Vanity Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love the different magnifications. The led lights lay flat and make the folding up pretty flat. It's very cute and like the dual ways to charge (battery and USB). The color is so cute. It's a little larger than what I'd take for traveling, but great for a vanity mirror
customer_reviews.author: ems

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my sister as a gift. She's an aspiring makeup artist and has come back multiple times to say it was just what she needed. While the product feels a little cheap, it doesn't affect the magnification or reflection, which is what I bought it for. The lights work well and it's been 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: You won’t tegret it
customer_reviews.text: I almost returned this at first my eyes were in shock from how bright it was but when I noticed how much better my makeup foundation application went on I decided to try it again and fell in love
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Remels

customer_reviews.title: Nah. Never again.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the mirror only, the light totally sucks guys. I was better off leaving the house with uneven/unfinished foundation on my face... but hey, at least I still had my money then.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This mirror doesn’t light up brightly I don’t even use it because I can’t see out of it, it’s misleading. Don’t buy this mirror it’s only looks pretty it don’t work well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Andrea Anderson

customer_reviews.title: No power cord?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why some manufacturers are not including a power supply with their products these days. This comes with a phone charging cord with no charging block to plug into the wall. Other than that, it’s a decent makeup mirror. Would rate higher with a power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy McGowan

customer_reviews.title: It does NOT have a power cord
customer_reviews.text: So there are some things posted on this product in the question and answers that had me believing you could plug this mirror into an outlet, you cannot. It does not have a power cord for an outlet. It does have a USB cord so you could get an adapter to plug into an outlet, but it does not come with one.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it 0 stars but can’t!!HORRIBLE PURCHASE. I bought it for myself and was so happy about it when it came in, gave great light for an hour. And then dies unless the cord is up high but if I move and do anything to my desk like my makeup or to change position to be closer it does and doesn’t come back on, worst purchase ever. So disappointed. It worked when I plugged into my laptop and charge it but nothing. Put new batteries in and still gives me 10 mins at most. HORRIBLE DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Was worth it
customer_reviews.text: Lights work , the charger worked but I prefer the batteries. A heads up to anyone buying having he lights to the brightest will hurt your eyes after a while so I only recommend using the lights if you really have to after putting the base on I couldn’t seem to get it back off so definitely not for traveling
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!! ITS JUNK!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolute junk! Got it for my wife for a present but the lights will not turn on. After reading more reviews and questions and answers it seems like this is a major issue with these mirrors. Dont waste your time or money on this brand! JUNK!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kale Nicodemus

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but too bright for me
customer_reviews.text: The lights are too bright, it is a great mirror and in all other aspects is perfect but I bought this a replacement when another brand broke and the lights on this one are blinding, they are great for using the mirror very close up like tweezing eyebrows/applying eyeliner but at a normal sitting distance they are so bright I cant actually see myself.
customer_reviews.author: hboss

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. Plug in or battery operated (4 AAA). I love the brightness & dimming effect, the magnified mirror on the side is great & lays flat for travel. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Rigsby

customer_reviews.title: So bright!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item! I use the big mirror more than the smaller ones. The big main mirror is great when i put on my makeup and the lights are bright! It comes with a cable you can connect with a usb and plug in the wall but i use batteries. The lights are very bright! The smaller mirrors are ok, they are small and uncomfortable to use, you have to tilt your head and try to find a good position. Overall, i like this item and it is very helpful and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Aragon

customer_reviews.title: It is a small circle of magnification, u stick on glass.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a magnifying mirror , but all they give u is a small magnifier which sticks on glass. The lights around the mirror makes it hard to see while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: deweisn Tri-Fold Lighted Vanity Mirror with 21 LED Lights, Touch Screen and 3X/2X/1X Magnification, Two Power Supply Modes Make Up Mirror,Travel Mirror
feature_bullets: Built in 21pcs LED lights, which is intelligent to adjust brightness by touch sensor switch, long press to dimmer the light.You can make up you in poorly light, without disturbing others.
Dual power supply modes:Operated by Micro USB cable supply or 4AAA batteries( battery not included, usb wire included) , pls noted the mirror can't store power by itself.
180°swivel rotatable, can be fixed at any position as you needed, tri-fold design vanity mirrors provided with wide angle viewing.

Side-view mirror panels adjust for custom viewing.3X/2X/1X Magnification used together for perfect makeup, you can see the tiniest beauty details,great for grooming brows,applying eyeliner,and tweezing.And the Base Recess can hold jewelry or cosmetics like watch, earrings, bracelets, etc. Perfect gift for ladies and girls.

ONE YEAR QUALITY WARRANTY for all DeWEISN makeup mirror with light. Pls send email to us for any quality issue. Made from premium ABS material and mirror glass,perfect looking and resistance for scratch.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
